participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative and easygoing, enjoys artistic pursuits and spending time with family.
participant_1.background: I play the guitar and sing as a way to relax and express myself. I'm not married, but I have been playing video games with my kids since they were little. I am entering the police academy this summer. I love to recycle and also love drawing.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, values family and enjoys music as a form of escape.
participant_2.background: I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home! I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips. I work hard and save money for my future. I am a financial analyst for a brewery. I own a french bulldog.

content.text: Not much, just enjoying some music. What are you doing?
I am working on some reports for my job. It's a lot of work!
Oh, that sounds tough. I work at a brewery, so I get to play music all the time.
That sounds fun! I love music. I play the guitar and sing.
That's awesome! I play the guitar too, but I don't sing very well.
It doesn't matter if you're good or not, just as long as you enjoy it.
I agree! I love to play music. It's a great way to relax and express myself.
I know what you mean. I love to sing along to my favorite songs when I'm driving.
Me too! I love singing along to Queen.
They're one of my favorite bands!
They're so good! I love their music.
Me too! I'm glad I met you. We should hang out sometime and play music together.
That would be fun! I'd love to
